page.title: 15HEDGEROWS CHURCH LANE CAPEL
page.content: NEARLY ALL THE HEDGES IN CHURCH LANE ARE OVER 500 YEARS OLD. IN A TREE COUNT OVER 100 METRES WE FOUND SIX DIFFERENT TREES - HAZEL, BLACKTHORN, OAK, HAWTHORN, ASH AND ELDER. IN EACH HEDGE THERE IS AN ABUNDANCE OF INTERESTING FLOWERS,TREES AND CLIMBING PLANTS. I FOUND 23 COLOURFUL SPECIES OF WILDFLOWERS, 10 CLIMBING PLANTS AND 16 TREES, 9 OF WHICH ARE NATIVE TREES AND 7 INTRODUCED SPECIES. {THERE HAS BEEN A RECENT INCREASE OF {WILD PLANTS IN THE LANE BECAUSE THE {ESCALATING COST OF INSECTICIDES AND {HERBICIDES HAS RESULTED IN A DECREASE {OF THEIR USE BY FARMERS. WILD LIFE HAS {ALSO BENEFITTED FROM COUNCIL ECONOMIES {IN VERGE CONTROL.}SOME WILD FLOWERS I HAVE OBSERVED WERE POPPY, HOP TREFOIL, ROSEBAY WILLOW HERB,HAIRY WILLOW HERB, SELF HEAL, HOGWEED, CRANESBILL,MALLOW, COW PARSLEY AND MANY VETCHES.
